an6.43:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
an6.43:1.2: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya savatthiyam pindaya pavisi.
an6.43:1.3: Savatthiyam pindaya caritva pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
an6.43:1.5: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato paccassosi.
an6.43:2.1: Atha kho bhagava ayasmata anandena saddhim yena pubbaramo migaramatupasado tenupasankami.
an6.43:2.2: Atha kho bhagava sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
an6.43:2.4: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato paccassosi.
an6.43:2.5: Atha kho bhagava ayasmata anandena saddhim yena pubbakotthako tenupasankami gattani parisincitum.
an6.43:2.6: Pubbakotthake gattani parisincitva paccuttaritva ekacivaro atthasi gattani pubbapayamano.
an6.43:3.1: Tena kho pana samayena ranno pasenadissa kosalassa seto nama nago mahaturiyatalitavaditena pubbakotthaka paccuttarati.
an6.43:3.3: “abhirupo vata bho ranno nago; dassaniyo vata bho ranno nago; pasadiko vata, bho, ranno nago, kayupapanno vata bho ranno nago”ti.
an6.43:3.4: Evam vutte, ayasma udayi bhagavantam etadavoca:
an6.43:3.5: “hatthimeva nu kho, bhante, mahantam brahantam kayupapannam jano disva evamaha:
an6.43:3.6: ‘nago vata bho nago’ti, udahu annampi kanci mahantam brahantam kayupapannam jano disva evamaha: ‘nago vata bho nago’”ti?
an6.43:3.7: “Hatthimpi kho, udayi, mahantam brahantam kayupapannam jano disva evamaha:
an6.43:3.13: manussampi kho, udayi, mahantam brahantam kayupapannam jano disva evamaha:
an6.43:3.15: Api ca, udayi, yo sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya agum na karoti kayena vacaya manasa, tamaham ‘nago’ti brumi”ti.
an6.43:4.3: api ca, udayi, yo sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya agum na karoti kayena vacaya manasa, tamaham ‘nago’ti brumiti.
an6.43:4.4: Idanca panaham, bhante, bhagavata subhasitam imahi gathahi anumodami—
